title: Multimodal English Communication Competency Enhancement Program for Textile Dyeing and Processing Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English sentence structures and exposure to fundamental dyeing/processing terminology
context.additional_context: Hybrid operation of lab/online platforms. Mandatory inclusion of simulation activities based on real-world industry cases

learning_goals: Accurately utilize over 50 industry-specific technical terms in context within two weeks
Perform English collaborative communication three or more times in a virtual dyeing process simulation
Analyze multimodal materials (videos/diagrams/charts) to write technical reports with 80% accuracy
Develop two practical problem-solving scenarios collaboratively with peer learners through peer review assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
